html:
Solutions that backfire
Drugs in school
Shattered our families
Everyone moves out
Who stayed doesn’t care
Girls with no boys
Boys with no girls
Surrounded by strangers
Building life again
Broken societies
Broken lifes
No clue what’s going down
Becoming alone
Becoming ill
No school finished
At hospitals in isolation
Eventually stigmatized
Waiting for death
title: Raw Beef
